name: Konora paypal
author: Konora ltd

sections.description: Just fill the form in admin page and click \”crea\” button to create a file php whit inside a form with the information to send a paypal payment requeset. Don\’t need have a paypal account, of course i hope for you to put an email that can take the money ðŸ™‚ (this first version is in italian only)
sections.installation: 1) Decomprimi il pacchetto contenente il plugin della giusta directory di WordPress 2) Attiva il plugin dal menu \’Plugins\’ in WordPress 3) Apri la pagina \’KPP\’ dal menu a destra

short_description: Easy way to create a php file to redirect to paypal payment system
description: Just fill the form in admin page and click \”crea\” button to create a file php whit inside a form with the information to send a paypal payment requeset. Don\’t need have a paypal account, of course i hope for you to put an email that can take the money ðŸ™‚ (this first version is in italian only)
